description: This file demonstrates how to use the TodoistTools with the Agno framework, including setting up an Agent with specific instructions and examples of creating, deleting, and retrieving Todoist tasks.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an autonomous agent configured with specific instructions, tools, and a language model.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response generated by the agent based on the input prompt.
